question: Who is selected for living legend award of International Union of Nutritional Sciences (IUNS)?
explanation: Mahtab Bamji has been selected for the Living Legend Award of the International Union of Nutritional Sciences ((IUNS). The award will be presented at its General Assembly to be held at the IUNS-ICN in Buenos Aires, Argentina on 18th October. The award is a recognition for those who have significantly contributed to the work of national nutrition society or regional organization.
